definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: knife, so Vulgate (cf. Syr. h.lap totondit (in Lex.), h.lopo0, h.lowpto0, knife, Talm. [[חליפות]] knives, acc. to Levy, Jastr ; Thes as passing through (cf. vb.

definitions.body: )); but √ and meaning not certain, only Pl. [[מַחֲלָפִים]] Ezr 1:9, among temple utensils (v. BeRy Ryle).
